mapper.select: SELECT su.id, su.org_id, su.username, su.`password`, su.account_non_expired, su.account_non_locked, su.credentials_non_expired, su.`enable`, su.delete_status, su.mobile, su.email, su.remark, su.gmt_create, su.gmt_modified FROM sys_user AS su WHERE su.username = #{value}

SELECT sc.`id`, sc.client_id, sc.client_name, sc.resource_ids AS resourceIdStr, sc.client_secret, sc.scope AS scopeStr, sc.authorized_grant_types AS authorizedGrantTypesStr, sc.web_server_redirect_uri, sc.web_server_redirect_uri, sc.access_token_validity, sc.refresh_token_validity, sc.additional_information, sc.autoapprove, sc.gmt_create FROM sys_client AS sc WHERE sc.client_id = #{value}
